resources.string: [nl]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.

[nl]AppInfra is the components top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[nl]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[nl]Connectivity feature in Reference App, provides the ability to pair the mobile application with a reference device using Bluetooth capability for capturing the data from the device to the mobile application.

[nl]Data Services is a common component that acts as a gateway to data core. It will provide synchronization with application data base for the below support the following types of data -\n
  • Moments, Consents, Insights, Push notification and user characteristics.

[nl]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales.

[nl]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase.
[nl]UI Toolkit is a component that provides UI controls that are present in the designs provided by the design team on all the screens of the mobile application.

[nl]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization social media specific credentials.

[nl]"Special offers, promotions and first hand information about new product releases.
Tailored for you!

Join 140.000 of your peers now!"

[nl]AppInfra is the component\'s top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[nl]Connectivity feature in Reference App, provides the ability to pair the mobile application with a reference device using Bluetooth capability for capturing the data from the device to the mobile application

[nl]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[nl]Data Services is a common component that acts as a gateway to data core. It will provide synchronization with application data base for the below support the following types of data: Moments, Consents, Insights, Push notification and user characteristics

[nl]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales

[nl]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase
[nl]UI Toolkit is a component that provides UI controls that are present in the designs provided by the design team on all the screens of the mobile application

[nl]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization / social media specific credentials
[nl]You can make Philips purchases or via 3rd party retailers here.
[nl]You can contact Philips consumer care here. Consumer Care is the destination for all Philips questions, product information and reviews.

[nl]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.
[nl]Wait..While we fetch your sleep data from device

[nl]ReferenceApp is a base platform used by all propositions to develop and maintain features both generic and specific to the propositions. App infra, Data Gateway, App FWK, and UIToolkit allow Apps to be created from uApps and UI-less services/libraries. ReferenceApp acts as a foundation over which CDP2 uApps and proposition specific uApps are integrated to form individual apps.

[nl]This app integrates the common components required to develop new IoT solutions for acceleration across Philips. It is the first reference for the development of all new patient medical or consumer mobile apps.
[nl]Designers, developers and business leaders across Philips.
[nl]Reference App comprises all of the configurable common components that are part of the CDP2 platform.
[nl]It provides all the reference information and tools needed to accelerate and harmonize UX development and ensure appropriate HSDP integration.
[nl]The UX has been fully approved by Philips Design and will soon be in DLS.
[nl]The complete platform is tagged and delivers data to monitor &amp; improve your proposition.
[nl]The Security &amp; Privacy actions of the complete platform are fully in line with Philips rule.
[nl]Localization of your proposition is enabled by the platform, including China.
[nl]<html>The CDP<sup><small>2<small>&<sup> platform is fully integrated with HSDP and IT to ensure all functionalities are enabled end-2-end within the Philips landscape.</html>
Gegevensveld is leeg of bevat ongeldige gegevens
In het tekstvak komt specifieke grote concepttekst
U hebt ongeldige parameters ingevoerd of geselecteerd. Selecteer de juiste parameters en probeer het opnieuw
[nl]I allow Philips to store binary data
[nl]I allow Philips to use my mobile application usage statistics
[nl]I allow Philips to use my data for Coaching purposes
[nl]The actual content of the binary consent help text here
[nl]By revoking consent your data will be deleted from our servers.

Ik geef Philips toestemming om mijn appgegevens te verzamelen zodat er relevante content en advertenties kunnen worden getoond en zodat de app kan functioneren, kan worden verbeterd, kan worden gepersonaliseerd en kan worden geïntegreerd met sociale media.

Cookieverklaring

Deze app maakt gebruik van Adobe Analytics, een analyseservice ('Adobe Analytics') van Adobe Systems Software Ireland Limited ('Adobe'). Adobe Analytics maakt gebruik van 'cookies' of vergelijkbare technieken. Dit zijn tekstbestanden die in de app worden geplaatst om gebruikspatronen van de app te kunnen analyseren. Wanneer de cookie-informatie over het gebruik van de app naar Adobe wordt verzonden, wordt het IP-adres eerst geanonimiseerd voordat de geografische locatie wordt bepaald. Dit adres wordt vervangen door een algemeen IP-adres voordat de gegevens worden opgeslagen. Adobe gebruikt deze gegevens namens Philips om het gebruik van de app te analyseren, rapporten over de activiteit van de app op te stellen voor Philips en andere diensten te verlenen aan Philips die te maken hebben met de activiteit en het gebruik van de app. Adobe koppelt uw IP-adres niet aan andere gegevens waarover Adobe beschikt. U kunt voorkomen dat Adobe en Philips de gegevens (de cookies en het IP-adres) verzamelen en gebruiken door u zich hiervoor af te melden nadat u dit scherm sluit.
[nl]By revoking consent your data will be deleted from our servers.
[nl]The actual content of the coaching consent help text here
[nl]By revoking consent your data will be deleted from our servers.

Door uw toestemming kunnen de bedrijven uit de Philips-groep u voor promotionele doeleinden benaderen via e-mail, sms en andere digitale kanalen, zoals mobiele apps en sociale media. Om de berichtgeving te kunnen aanpassen aan uw voorkeuren en gedrag en u de beste persoonlijke ervaring te bieden, kunnen we mogelijk uw persoonsgegevens analyseren en combineren. Deze gegevens kunnen bestaan uit: 

Gegevens die u ons verstrekt
Gegevens die u met ons hebt gedeeld, zoals uw naam, geboortedatum of leeftijd, e-mailadres, woonadres, land, geslacht, telefoonnummer, social-mediaprofiel.

Gegevens die wij hebben verkregen via uw interactie met Philips
Gegevens over uw interactie met en het gebruik van de digitale kanalen van Philips, zoals social media, websites, e-mail, apps en verbonden producten. Deze gegevens kunnen het volgende omvatten: IP-adres, cookies, apparaatinformatie, berichten waar u op klikt, locatiegegevens en websites die u bezoekt

U kunt uw toestemming aan Philips op ieder gewenst moment intrekken.
Lees voor meer informatie de Philips-privacyverklaring en de Philips-cookieverklaring.
[nl]The actual content of the moment consent help text here
[nl]By revoking consent your data will be deleted from our servers.
[nl]The actual content of the research and analytics consent help text here
[nl]By revoking consent your data will be deleted from our servers.

[nl]I allow Philips to use my data for Research and Analytics purposes

Verleng uw garantie met 24 maanden. \nOntvang 10% korting in de Philips Store. \nOntvang gratis productaccessoires
Een e-mail met contract voor uitgebreide garantie is verzonden naar uw e-mailadres
Uw garantieperiode is verlengd tot volgend jaar
[nl]We’ve detected that you have rooted the device or jailbroken, thereby making it easier for others to access your data and no security on your application data.
[nl]We’ve detected that you have jailbroken and not activated screenlock, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
[nl]We’ve detected the screenlock of your mobile phone is to enabled, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
Promotionele berichten van Philips ontvangen gebaseerd op mijn voorkeuren en online gedrag
Weet u zeker dat u zich wilt afmelden?
Configuratie kan alleen worden gewijzigd bij het starten van de app. U dient de app opnieuw te starten om de configuratie te wijzigen
Er is een fout opgetreden bij het bijwerken van de gebruikersgegevens. Probeer het later opnieuw
